ygData.subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] Leeroy Jenkins
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a website that does weekly comic strips of EQ I think I believe it s pvponline.com or pvp.com.. Not sure. Not sure if it s still there but there was a
ygData.messageBody:
There is a website that does weekly comic strips of EQ I think I believe it's pvponline.com or pvp.com.. Not sure.
Not sure if it's still there but there was a guide on how to be annoying in Everquest on somethingawful.com.
My brother actually tried some of the ideas. He aggrod a bixie and then convinced some newbs that it was his friend in shapeshifted form and got them to try to invite it to group. He was like "would you group with my friend please? He's not very big but he can punch pretty hard". He also did the same with some prisoners in Highkeep. Took them to the warrior room. Nobody believed him and started killing the prisoners. My bro was like "NO! He's my friend!!" When they looted the corpses he was like "NOOO! Now he can't get a rez and he lost his level!!"
I'll have to look up more sites with EQ stuff.
luv,
-Su

======= At 2005-06-06, 16:45:00 you wrote: =======

>Where can somebody find more stuff like this, or more EQ-related humour sites? I've only been playing since just before the new year, but I think this stuff is totally hilarious and would like to see more.
>
>Birogue of Bristlebane
>
>
>
>Wulfric Rennison <wulftech@...> wrote:
>Some people just have incredibly way too much time on their hands!!!
>
>That's awesome. Almost made me want to start playing Star Wars Galaxies.
>
>Wulfric
>
>
>
>
>

>> luv,
>> -Su
